thread.section_title: Hotel des Comedies - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent
thread.title_full: Excellent - Review of Hotel des Comedies, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Maria Jo√£o G
title: Excellent
text:
A very good little hotel! The room is very nice with a great space and the bathroom very good and clean. The beds are super comfortable. Close to subway but on a quiet street. Close to good restaurants, some cheap (MacDonalds and Pizzahut) and other more expensive.
Samira is a lovely person, and always with a great smile, she helps us all the time.
